name: Montant et mode de paiement égaux et date égales
Montant égaux et date dans les fourchettes
query: moveLine?.debit.equals(credit) && moveLine?.credit.equals(debit) && ((moveLine?.dueDate <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.dueDate <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)))

name: Montant et mode de paiement égaux et date dans les fourchettes
query: moveLine?.move?.paymentMode.equals(paymentMode) && moveLine?.debit.equals(credit) && moveLine?.credit.equals(debit) && ((moveLine?.dueDate <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.dueDate <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)))

name: Montant égaux et date dans les fourchettes
query: moveLine?.debit.equals(credit) && moveLine?.credit.equals(debit) && ((moveLine?.dueDate <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.dueDate <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)))

name: Montant et date dans les fourchettes
query: moveLine?.debit >= credit * %amt- && moveLine?.debit <= credit * %amt+ && moveLine?.credit >= debit * %amt- && moveLine?.credit <= debit * %amt+ && ((moveLine?.dueDate <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= valueDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=valueDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.dueDate <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.dueDate >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)) || (moveLine?.date <= operationDate?.plusDays(%date) && moveLine?.date >=operationDate?.minusDays(%date)))
